snippet: A video blogger has remixed footage of a 2009 interview of Asma al-Assad to make it seem as if she was speaking out against the violent crackdown on dissent currently under way in Syria.
abstract: A video blogger has remixed footage of a 2009 interview of Asma al-Assad to make it seem as if she was speaking out against the violent crackdown on dissent currently under way in Syria.

headline.main: Video Imagines Syrian First Lady's Outrage Over Gaza War Applied to Killing in Homs
